channel.title: 100% unanswered need major help@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@
channel.description: Ok so i am using the zombie-scape source. If you try and wear items (even if u have stat requirements) it wont let you. It's not that you dont have requirements met but its just weird that u cant wear. The coder of the server did say in his post in download section he broke the cache and u have to code in the items urself but how do you do that? please help[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2009, 12:42:02 pm[/size][hr]the person who made also said this [quote="Tatemo, post:12, topic:286208"]Ummmm yeah. I forgot to mention that. I ah broke the cache by accident and Runescape items dont work unless u manually code them in the server. There is an example of how at the top of potions.java case 1265.[/quote]

item.title: 100% unanswered need major help@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

Lin:

You’re not sending the item equipping packet. Check the equip item packet and make sure it’s calling some type of wearing/equipping method.

this is for lin

case 41:
// wear item
int wearID = inStream.readUnsignedWord();
int wearSlot = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();

		interfaceID = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();
		if (!antiHax())
			break;
		if (playerEquipment[playerAmulet] == 1704) {
			playerLevel[7] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[7]);
			playerLevel[7] += 5;
			sendFrame126("" + playerLevel[7] + "", 4032);
		}

		// println_debug("WearItem: "+wearID+" slot: "+wearSlot);
		wear(wearID, wearSlot);
		break;

Read full topic
